patthana8.27:1.1: Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana8.27:2.1: Naaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana8.27:3.1: Naganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.27:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha pañca.)
